doc:
Charlotte Riley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charlotte_Riley 0 Charlotte Louise Riley (born 29 December 1981) is an English actress. She is known for her roles as Sarah Hurst in Easy Virtue, Catherine Earnshaw in ITV's adaptation of Wuthering Heights and in the lead role as Holly Evans in BBC One's six-part drama Press. Charlotte_Louise_Riley ( born_29_December_1981 ) is an_English_actress . She is_known for her_roles as Sarah_Hurst in Easy_Virtue , Catherine_Earnshaw in ITV 's_adaptation of Wuthering_Heights and in the_lead_role as Holly_Evans in BBC_One 's_six-part_drama_Press .
